title: Dry Eyes
lyrics:
You know what you’re doing
Bringing him around my friends
Crossing your fingers that it’d get back to me, no (no)
That shit’s stupid
‘Cause you manipulate the situation wishin’ I would fall back into you (Truitt: you, you, you, you)
Don’t think you can’t understand (Truitt: you, you, you, you)

Ooh you’re forcing my hand (Truitt: you)

It hurts me to say it, baby



‘Cause now I’m seein’ it with dry eyes

I’m lookin’ up to clear skies

Now I’ve got one hell of a view

(I’m not thinkin’ of u)

Dry eyes now I’m doin’ just fine

‘Cause I got nothin’ for you

(I’ve got nothin’ for you)



Your mouth

Keeps spitting my name

So I hope she likes the taste of bein’ replaced

Ooh it’s a damn shame

That you trip when you see me up with my new flame



(Phangs: you, you, you, you) Don’t think you can’t understand

(Phangs: you, you, you, you) That you’re forcing my hand

(Phangs: you) It hurts me to say it, baby



‘Cause now I’m seein’ it with dry eyes

I’m lookin’ up to clear skies

Now I’ve got one hell of a view

(I’m not thinkin’ of you)

Dry eyes now I’m doin’ just fine

‘Cause I got nothin’ for you

(I’ve got nothin’ for you)
